item.title: Week12
item.description: MITgcm 4 degree global ocean Global ocean : link data.diagnostics Jupyter notebook file for the analysis: Link (python version) Modifying heat flux file with open('../run/ncep_qnet.bin','rb') as f: data = np.fromfile(f, '>f4') qflx = data.reshape(12, ny, nx) # I know that this is monthly forcing data. ndata = qflx[:,:,:]/2 fs = open('new_qflx.bin','wb'); ndata.astype('>f4').tofile(fs);
